application.ref: GROBID - A machine learning software for extracting information from scholarly documents

titleStmt.title: A Boosting Framework on Grounds of Online Learning

affiliation.orgName: Computer Engineering and Networks Laboratory ETH Zurich

analytic.title: A Boosting Framework on Grounds of Online Learning

abstract.p: By exploiting the duality between boosting and online learning, we present a boosting framework which proves to be extremely powerful thanks to employing the vast knowledge available in the online learning area. Using this framework, we develop various algorithms to address multiple practically and theoretically interesting questions including sparse boosting, smooth-distribution boosting, agnostic learning and, as a by-product, some generalization to double-projection online learning algorithms.
